    • Method Detail

      • addInterestedPartyToEvent

        org.json.simple.JSONObject addInterestedPartyToEvent(int stdid,
                                                   int stdactid,
                                                   int ptyid,
                                                   java.lang.String ptystatus)
        This method allows to show a party who are interested in given event. So he can get latest notification about that event.
        Parameters:
        stdid - the primary key of studio.
        stdactid - the primary key of studio activity id.
        ptyid - the primary key of party.
        ptystatus - It has constant text "ACCEPTED".
        Returns:
        returns success message with inserted row id.

      • isInterested

        boolean isInterested(int ptyid,
                   int stdid,
                   int stdactid,
                   java.lang.String status)
        This method used to check whether the party already accepted or not. If already accepted, It will return true message otherwise return false.
        Parameters:
        ptyid - an unique id of party element.
        stdid - an unique id of studio element.
        stdactid - an unique id of studio activity id element.
        status - it has constant text "ACCEPTED".
        Returns:
        return boolean true or false message.

      • userCheckin

        org.json.simple.JSONObject userCheckin(java.lang.String bconId,
                                     double bconrange,
                                     int ptyId,
                                     java.util.Date checkintime)
        Beacons will call this method when party check in any studio to register their entry.
        Parameters:
        bconId - beacon id it has mapped with the studio.
        bconrange - beacon detecting range.
        ptyId - an unique id of party element.
        checkintime - party entering time into studio.
        Returns:
        returns success message.

      • userCheckout

        org.json.simple.JSONObject userCheckout(int ptystaId,
                                      java.util.Date checkouttime)
        Beacons will call this method when party check out any studio to register their entry.
        Parameters:
        ptystaId - an unique id of studio party activity element.
        checkouttime - party exist time from the studio.
        Returns:
        returns success message.

      • myProfile

        org.json.simple.JSONObject myProfile(int partyid)
        This method used to bring activities and history from the database.
        Parameters:
        partyid - the primary key of the id.
        Returns:
        it will return points history.

      • myChallenge

        org.json.simple.JSONArray myChallenge(int partyid)
        All of accepted challenge will be listed here based on given party id.
        Parameters:
        partyid - an unique id of party.
        Returns:
        returns list of accepted challenge as a JSONArray.

      • myBadges

        org.json.simple.JSONArray myBadges(int partyid)
        It will get a list of badges a party has already won.
        Parameters:
        partyid - an unique id of party.
        Returns:
        returns list of badges a party has won.

      • participantsSearch

        org.json.simple.JSONArray participantsSearch(java.lang.String name,
                                           int staid)
        It will get one or more participants who are actively accepted or attended given challenge based on their name.
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the participants.
        staid - the primary key of studio activity id.
        Returns:
        return jsonarray contains all the participant information.

      • selectWinner

        org.json.simple.JSONObject selectWinner(int ptyId,
                                      int staId,
                                      int staStdId,
                                      java.util.Date checkintime,
                                      java.lang.String gainedTaskBage)
        This function used for selecting winners from list of participants who are all finished their challenge.
        Parameters:
        ptyId - the primary key of party.
        staId - an unique id of studio activity id.
        staStdId - an unique id of studio.
        checkintime - winner selected date and time.
        gainedTaskBage -
        Returns:
        returns challenge's id on which new winner has been selected.
